schema.title: Marketplace

items.description: A Module is a component that can be attached to an ADO, enhancing its functionality by adding specific features or capabilities, like keeping a list of addresses or adding a royalty rate.

address.description: Can be either an address or the app component name of a specific ADO module within an app.

schema.description: The Marketplace is an ADO that allows you to sell your NFTs in a marketplace.

ui:options.title: Modules
ui:options.description: Added modules will appear in this section. Compatibility varies depending on your build.

alerts.text: Each sale is assigned an Id which starts at the number 1, then increments for each new sale.

ui:options.title: Identifier
ui:options.description: Can be either an address or app component name of a specific ADO within an app

ui:options.title: Module Type
ui:options.description: The name of the module to add. Can be set one of the following: "rates", "address_list", "receipt".
